summary: This DOJ OIG memorandum documents the transfer of a CDR containing video footage from the MCC New York Special Housing Unit (SHU) from August 9-10, 2019, related to the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's death. The footage was originally extracted by the FBI and later copied and retained by the OIG.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate whose death at MCC New York is under investigation; the video footage from the SHU where he was held is the subject of this transfer.

persons.name: Special Agent
persons.context: Transferred the CDR containing MCC SHU video footage to the FBI and later made an authenticated copy for OIG case files.

connections.description: The Special Agent is handling evidence (video footage) related to the investigation into Epstein's death.

events.title: Video Footage Recording Begins
events.description: Security camera video recording from within the MCC New York Special Housing Unit (SHU) begins at 9:00 p.m.

events.title: Video Footage Recording Ends / Epstein's Death
events.description: Security camera video recording from within the MCC New York SHU ends at 8:00 a.m., covering the period around Jeffrey Epstein's death.

events.title: FBI Seizes DVR and Conducts Forensic Extraction
events.description: Immediately after Epstein's death, the FBI seized MCC New York security camera DVR systems and the FBI Computer Analysis Response Team conducted a forensic extraction from the camera near unit 10 South.

events.title: Transfer of CDR Video Footage
events.description: A DOJ OIG Special Agent transferred a CDR labeled with FBI case number 90A-NY-3151227, containing the extracted SHU video footage, back to the FBI.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center New York (MCC New York), New York
MCC New York Special Housing Unit (SHU)
keyFacts: The FBI seized MCC New York security camera DVR systems immediately after Jeffrey Epstein's death and forensically extracted video from a camera near the entrance of unit 10 South in the SHU.
The transferred CDR contained 11 MP4 files of video footage from within the SHU from August 9, 2019, at 9:00 p.m. through August 10, 2019, at 8:00 a.m.
The DOJ OIG made an authenticated copy of the CDR before returning the original to the FBI and retained the copy in their case files.
The video footage is central to the joint DOJ OIG and FBI investigation into the circumstances of Epstein's death at MCC New York.
